Reporting¶

Functions for reporting vehicle-, fleet-, charge station-, & grid-level results for simulation

hive.reporting.generate_logs(objects, log_path, context)[source]¶

Generates logs for a list of hive objects.

Parameters

  • objects (list) – list of hive objects for which to write logs.

  • lob_path (str) – filepath for where to write the logs to.

  • context (str) – string representing the type of object that is being passed.

hive.reporting.summarize_fleet_stats(vehicle_log_path, summary_path)[source]¶

Generates fleet level summary statistics.

Parameters

  • vehicle_log_path (str) – filepath to where vehicle logs are written.

  • summary_path (str) – path to where to write the fleet summary stats.

hive.reporting.summarize_station_use(stations, bases, station_summary_file)[source]¶

Generates station level summary statistics.

Parameters

  • stations (list) – list of station objects.

  • bases (list) – list of bases objects.

  • station_summary_file (str) – filepath for where to write station summary stats.
